evidence.claim: Keya Medical utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure and data storage.
The company implements X12 transaction sets for health insurance claims processing.
Keya Medical supports FHIR standards for interoperability between healthcare applications.
Integration patterns include REST and SOAP APIs to ensure seamless data interchange.

icp.icp_reason: Keya Medical uses X12 standards and operates API-first, suitable for healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: API integration with payers and providers
